name: Red Remover
description:
Pick it up now for 165 levels of mind-bending puzzle fun!
Your goal is to remove the red shapes without any green shapes falling off the screen. This starts out easy but things get pretty weird after level 10.
Features:
- iPad, iPhone 5, Retina and Game Center!
- 165 levels ranging from very easy to mind meltingly hard.
- Most levels are exclusive to this version and can't be played anywhere else.
- Adorable green shapes.
- Miserable red shapes that must be removed!
This is the official Red Remover app created by Gaz Thomas and Colin Payette from The Game Homepage.
Enjoy!
Game Walkthrough: http://bit.ly/bP7DZU
